import React from "react"; import "./Description.css"; export default function Description() { return (

Project Description

[Migr-ai-tion.net] is an applied, interdisciplinary
research project that investigates the potentials of AI
as a participatory and therapeutic medium to work with the digital
diaspora. Situated at the nexus of migration studies, media and future anthropology and
speculative design, the project tackles issues such as data colonialism in computer vision,
stereotypes, marginalization, collective trauma and agency.  The platform will collect
and map a collaborative image dataset, uploaded by users
worldwide for training future computer
vision technologies challenging
mainstream representations
of migrant experiences.

); }
